name: Little Racoon Big Wash (puzzle game)
description: Collect all the golden starts and finish all the available levels. Your goal will be to create a way the water will flow through with your finger. Expect to run into problems though, since the difficulty of the levels will get progressively higher. You will have multiple fun levels to choose from. You aren’t discouraged from choosing any of the available ways, so you’re free to find the right solution.
